text: What is the primary purpose of a project management plan?

options.label: To document project risks and mitigation strategies.
To provide a comprehensive roadmap for project execution and control.
To outline the communication strategy for stakeholders.
To define the project's scope and deliverables.

explanation: The project management plan integrates all subsidiary plans and baselines, serving as a comprehensive guide for how the project will be executed, monitored, controlled, and closed.
